SELECT yao.*, yac.* FROM yssp_activity_order yao LEFT JOIN yssp_activity_contact yac ON yao.activity_order_id = yac.activity_contact_order_id AND yac.activity_contact_status !=-1 WHERE yao.activity_order_id =#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND yao.activity_order_status !=-1
